buginformation.summary: process common modules module exports failures when check types enabled
buginformation.description: you define module echo define function return echo function val window console log val and entry point that does not define any new modules var echo require echo echo echo hello world and compile with java jar build compiler jar formatting pretty print jscomp error check types compilation level simple optimizations transform amd modules process common modules echo echo main common entry module echo main you get the error echo main error property module exports never defined module echo main which probably happening because process common modules emit optional module exports override testing property that doesn exist can try cook patch but would probably fall back using goog def and there probably cleaner way what the intended definition entry points that not define new modules the following leaves call require function require echo function echo echo echo hello world this issue was closed revision 1982
